artifacts.summary: Complete analysis of Metalogic_v2 module dependencies with proposed bottom-up architecture diagram showing foundations first

summary: Analyzed all 18 Lean files in Metalogic_v2/ to map actual import dependencies. Found current diagram has inverted hierarchy, missing 4 modules, and misrepresents FMP.lean. Proposed new bottom-up diagram with foundations (Core, Soundness) at bottom and derived theorems (Completeness, Applications) at top.
